messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] New to unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: www.unschooling.com There are still people who have been on this list a while who are unaware of the parent forum of the list itself! Sandra
messages.messageBody:
www.unschooling.com

There are still people who have been on this list a while who are unaware of
the parent forum of the list itself!

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] New to unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Trisha, Do you have specific questions?  There are lots of smart, experienced, opinionated folks here.  Ask away. Unschooling is better. Deb L
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Trisha,
Do you have specific questions? There are lots of smart, experienced,
opinionated folks here. Ask away.
Unschooling is better.
Deb L

messages.subject: New to unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone!  Although I have homeschooled for 2 years, I am still looking for the right approach.  I have heard a little about the homeschooling idea and
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone! Although I have homeschooled for 2 years, I am still
looking for the right approach. I have heard a little about the
homeschooling "idea" and find it intriguing. Any and all feedback
(suggestions, comments, etc. . .) would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you,
Trisha
